values: 陪审团，全体陪审员；评判委员会，裁判委员会
A jury is a group of people that listen to a trial and say if someone is guilty.
The jury listened closely to the attorney before they made their decision.

To jury is to serve as a member of a jury in a trial.
A jury is a group of people who listen to evidence in a court case and decide on a verdict.
